title: I set up an Android TV box today & got an email welcoming me to my new “Pixel Phone”. Help? Why?
content: Since I don’t have a “Pixel Phone”, I am wondering why I got an email welcoming me to my new phone. I set up an Android TV box and signed in to Netflix and YouTube and then received the email telling me that I’d recently signed in to a Pixel device and welcoming me to my new phone. Has this happened to anyone else? I’m just checking that this has something to do with my Android TV or if I should lock down my google account...
